{{Infobox Underground Item |name = Shard Plates |image = [[File:Mine_Draco_Plate.png]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Draco Plate''. |price = |location = [[Underground]] }} ==Description== '''Shard Plates''' are 4x3 square big items you can mine up from the [[Underground]]. They can then either be sold for 100 [[Shards]] of their respective type, or traded for other items in Daily Deals if available that day. ===Types=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !
